user1.content: Hello Kent, how are you doing today? How's life as a student in Dinalupihan, Bataan? Have you had a chance to hit the gym and do some weight lifting lately, or work on your singing?
What's the name of my pets?
You have a few pets, Kent. You have three cats named Lala, Lulu, and Wendy, and a dog named Zacky. How are they doing, by the way?
just asking what my thesis project is all about?

Your thesis project, Kent. If I recall correctly, you're working on a project to "fit-up an AI-powered exercise program generation tailored to a user's goal". Is that right? It sounds like a fascinating project, especially given your interest in weight lifting. How's the project progressing so far?
